Sure, here is an updated pitch for Sunstoney that reflects the changes you requested:

Dear [Writer's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out and introduce you to the music of Sunstoney, an up-and-coming artist who is making waves in the indie and psych-pop scenes. With her dreamy and introspective sound, Sunstoney is quickly becoming known for her unique blend of lo-fi R&B and psych-pop, as well as her powerful and uplifting lyrics that explore themes of self-love, body neutrality, and mental health struggles.

Sunstoney's latest album, "2079," features a new direction in her music as she explores a dreamy and experimental sound. Produced in collaboration with Owen Martin (Knifing Around, RVA), the album is a sonic journey of self-discovery, with hypnotic beats, lush soundscapes, and a deep sense of introspection. The album is set to release soon and we would love to offer you an early listen or a review copy.

Sunstoney's music has been praised for its raw emotion, thought-provoking lyrics, and genre-bending sound. Her music is resonating with a growing audience of indie and psych-pop fans who are looking for something fresh and innovative in today's music scene.

We would be honored if [Publication Name] would consider providing editorial coverage of Sunstoney's latest album. We would also be happy to arrange an interview with Sunstoney for your publication. Sunstoney has a unique story to tell and we believe that your readers would be interested in learning more about her journey and her music.

Thank you for your time and consideration, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
